title: Microsoft Patch Tuesday, July 2025 Edition
summary: Microsoft today released updates to fix at least 137 security vulnerabilities in its Windows operating systems and supported software. title: Samsung announces major security enhancements coming to One UI 8
summary: Samsung has announced multiple data security and privacy enhancements for its upcoming Galaxy smartphones running One UI 8, its custom user interface on top of Android. [...]

title: M&S confirms social engineering led to massive ransomware attack
summary: M&S confirmed today that the retail outlet's network was initially breached in a "sophisticated impersonation attack" that ultimately led to a DragonForce ransomware attack. [...]

title: New Android TapTrap attack fools users with invisible UI trick
summary: A novel tapjacking technique can exploit user interface animations to bypass Android's permission system and allow access to sensitive data or trick users into performing destructive actions, such as wiping the device. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5062554 cumulative update released with 13 changes, fixes
summary: Microsoft has released the KB5062554 cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2 and Windows 10 21H2, with thirteen new fixes or changes. [...]

title: Hackers Use Leaked Shellter Tool License to Spread Lumma Stealer and SectopRAT Malware
summary:
In yet another instance of threat actors repurposing legitimate tools for malicious purposes, it has been discovered that hackers are exploiting a popular red teaming tool called Shellter to distribute stealer malware.

title: Windows 11 KB5062553 & KB5062552  cumulative updates released
summary: Microsoft has released Windows 11 KB5062553 and KB5062552 cumulative updates for versions 24H2 and 23H2 to fix security vulnerabilities and issues. [...]

title: Microsoft July 2025 Patch Tuesday fixes one zero-day, 137 flaws
summary: Today is Microsoft's July 2025 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 137 flaws, including one publicly disclosed zero-day vulnerability in Microsoft SQL Server. [...]
